participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful, introspective, and passionate about cooking.
participant_1.background: I love cooking, and Thai food is my favorite to cook. I recently broke up with my girlfriend. I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten. I am close to my family as we have always been there for each other. I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Nurturing, creative, and a bit nostalgic regarding family.
participant_2.background: I just cooked my family some spaghetti. I dream of winning the lottery. My husband was a salesman. I love to watch my mother dance, so I put a ballerina mobile in my nursery to remind me of her. I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.

content.text: Great, just got done making dinner for my family. How about you?
I'm good, just got off work. I'm hungry, what did you make for dinner?
Spaghetti. I love cooking, so I try to make something different every night.
That's awesome. I love cooking too, but I'm not very good at it.
You should try cooking more often. It's really rewarding to make something delicious.
I know, I've been meaning to start cooking more.
What's your favorite kind of food to eat?
That's a good choice. I love Thai food too.
We should cook Thai food together sometime.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
